attachments.displayName: Praise the Lord everyone, God bless you.  I have another request, this time its my sister who need prayer. She is in the hospital because she had water around her heart; they have remove most of it, but she will have a procedure on Monday. They will put a light down their to see what is going on with her heart.  Pray she will trust God through the doctors, but not put her trust in the doctors, but in God only.  She is one of my oldest sisters.  Thank you so much.  I am trusting God!!!  I am praying for you all too.  God bless you.

object.content:
Prayer request Today:
 
 Pray for the negotiators who seek to find conciliation with Iran and in both sides of the Syrian civil war.
 
 Pray for God’s protection over the men and women in America’s military continuing their service in Afghanistan.
 
 Pray for truth-telling from the government and others about the real nature of the American economy.
 
 Pray for Prime Minister Netanyahu and President Abbas as they seek to clear the long-held impasse.
 
 Pray about the unanticipated results of the implementation of ObamaCare about doctors and consumers ali
